reviews.title: Yuck!
reviews.text: Very noisy room - sounded like we were actually ON the adjacent freeway. Rooms are small and musty and motel is generally unkempt.

This was the first La Quinta we have stayed at in a long time and it was NOT a disappointment! Beautiful room, lovely grounds, great staff, breakfast each morning, and great location. This spot will definitely be on our list during our next stay to the area.
reviews.title: Excellent!

reviews.text: stayed there last night and it was very clean and quiet, certainly good value for the $90 for a king room.
reviews.title: good value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: right off I-10 and on Hospitality Lane with many eating options right close by.
reviews.title: Skimpy
Not very sharp
reviews.text: every time i stay in a hotel after reading the reviews on this website i really wonder what people expect for that kind of money.
the breakfast was the same as most places - no big bacon and eggs setup, just juice coffee, toast cereal bagels, fruit, etc.
reviews.title: Enjoyed our stay
